title: How to be a person who really makes things happen - Quora

response.answer_text: You have to get off your butt and go into the flames. You need to sometimes go where angels fear to tread. That’s the price you pay when you want to be on the team of making it happen.  Enjoy.
Clearly define your goal and make a list of what to do long-term, in the next year, in the next month, in the next week, and today. Take little steps and soon you will meet your goal.
